name: Arc Surfer
description: Arc Surfer is a new extreme sport, fusing the 80s with the technological marvels of the future. Compete online in this multiplayer, high speed, rail riding, platformer, in VR.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: PC needs to be VR Ready
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
